msbt.message: Dagnabit, .
Consarnit, .
Hey, , read this...
Pay attention, !
First, I wanna thank ya for the letter ya sent me.
First, I read your letter, so I wrote you this reply.
First, I spent the day reading your letter, looking for secret codes.
First, I want ya to know your letter was nice to get. Most things aren't.
First, I gotta say—you sure do know how to write a letter, kiddo.
Second, the sun went down just now and I still see folks outside walkin' around like that's normal.
Second, I had a piece of pie today that somehow had cherries in it! Never seen the like. Amazing.
Second, you ain't never known fear till yer face to face with yer own worst fear. That's a fear fact.
Second, outer space ain't real! Anybody who tells ya otherwise is sellin' somethin'!
Second, I've forgotten what I was going to write, and I refuse to look back so I can figure it out!
Third, are we really on an island?
Third, you heard any good jokes?
Third, ya ever just lie on the floor?
Third, this is the end of my letter.
Third, there's no third thing.
Go on now. From
I'm . Same as always.
The Original
Go on. Git. –
